shortdesc.ph: Gets the upper limit of the total cache size for cached files.
Gets the upper limit of the total cache size of cache files set.
Gets the maximum total cache size of cache files set.
Gets the maximum total cache size of cached media files set.

section.p: The SDK's default upper limit for the total cache size of cached files is 1GB. You can call the method to customize the total cache size limit.
The default upper limit of the total cache size in the SDK is 1GB. You can call the method to customize the upper limit of the total cache size.
The default maximum total cache size of cache files in the SDK is 1GB. You can call the method to customize the limit.
The default maximum total cache size of cache files in the SDK is 1 GB. You can call the method to customize the maximum total cache size.

ul.li: > 0: Success. Returns the total cache size limit of cached files, in bytes.
> 0: Success. Returns the upper limit of the total cache size of cache files in bytes.
> 0: Success. Returns the maximum total cache size in bytes.
> 0: The method call succeeds and returns the maximum total cache size of cache files in bytes.
